content:
ProfessionalColorTable Class

Definition

Provides colors used for Microsoft Office display elements.

In this Article

public class ProfessionalColorTable
Inheritance
System.Object
ProfessionalColorTable

Equals(Object,Object)

GetType()

ToString()

Remarks

An instance of this class is called by ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.

ImageMarginGradientBegin

Gets the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a ToolStripDropDownMenu.

public virtual System.Drawing.Color ImageMarginGradientBegin { get; }
Value
Color

A Color that is the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a ToolStripDropDownMenu.

Remarks

ShowImageMargin must be set to true for this color to be displayed.

ImageMarginGradientEnd

Gets the end color of the gradient used in the image margin of a ToolStripDropDownMenu.

UseSystemColors

Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use SystemColors rather than colors that match the current visual style.

public bool UseSystemColors { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true to use SystemColors; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Remarks

If visual styles or themes are turned off, the ToolStripProfessionalRenderer uses the colors in SystemColors.
